home.seerDescription: The chosen seer will guide you through the reading, each with a unique voice and wisdom. Who will you choose to light your path?
home.subtitle: YOUR GUIDE TO THE STARS

features.title: Discover the Worlds Within
features.subtitle: After registering, you'll gain access to a suite of mystical tools to illuminate your path. Discover what the stars have in store for you.

tarot.title: Tarot Readings
tarot.description: Gain insight with various card spreads, from past, present, and future to complex life questions.

coffee.title: Coffee Ground Reading
coffee.description: Decipher the symbols in your coffee cup and unveil messages about your future and inner self.

dream.title: Dream Interpretation
dream.description: Explore the hidden meanings of your dreams and understand what your subconscious is trying to tell you.

numerology.title: Numerology
numerology.description: Discover the power of numbers and how your birth date and name influence your life path and personality.
